title: Didnt get what i paid for (Bard)
body: I bought bard last night when i saw him in the store, however there was no splash art and bard didn't show up in my owned champions. after i downloaded the patch this morning bard still didn't show up, he is clearly visible in my purchases. please restore him to my account.

replies.body: Sorry to hear that Parmazan, we released Bard too early and that was our fault. If you can submit a ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new we will get this sorted asap.
